comments: The Baxter-Hickerson function provides a number whose cube lacks zeros.The next term is > 4400. - Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Sep 10 2005The next term is > 20000 (found using pfgw64). - _Patrick De Geest_, Jul 22 2012
